thread.title: IAF Recruitment 2017 (70 Vacancies Opening)

author: noreply@blogger.com (dinesh prabhu)
title: IAF Recruitment 2017 (70 Vacancies Opening)

organizations.name: recruitment rally / course / air command post

text:
Last Updated Monday, February 20, 2017 Advertisement 
Indian Air Force (IAF) is one of the Primary force of Indian Armed Forces (Military Forces) of the Republic of India. IAF Career as an Air Force Officer based in various Branches and various educational qualifications. There are two types of commission available in IAF, such as Permanent Commission and Short Service Commission. Indian National Candidates, who want to Join as an Air Force Officer in IAF - Get Indian Air Force Current Job Vacancies List in the post table. 
Permanent Commission -> It means a career in the Air Force till you retire. Permanent Commission Officers continue to serve till the age of superannuation. Short Service Commission (SSC) -> It means a limited period career in the Air Force. Join the IAF as a Short Service Commission Officer by opting for a SSC Course. 
IAF Career - as per Branches: 
a) Aeronautical Engineering Branch (Aeronautical Engineering Electronics, Aeronautical Engineering Mechanical) b) Flying Branch (As a Graduate, National Defence Academy (NDA) c) Ground Duty Branches 
IAF Career - as per Qualifications: 
a) 10+2 b) Engineer (Flying Branch, Ground Duty Branches, Technical Branch) c) Graduate (Flying Branch, Ground Duty Branches, Technical Branch) d) Post Graduate (Ground Duty Branches)
